item.title: Akame Ga Kill
item.description: Overview Type:TVEpisodes:24Status: Finished AiringAired:Jul 7, 2014 to Dec 15, 2014Premiered: Summer 2014Broadcast:Mondays at 00:00 (JST)Producers:Square Enix, TOHO animationLicensors: Sentai FilmworksStudios:White FoxSource:MangaGenres:Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, ShounenDuration:23 min. per ep.Rating:R - 17+ (violence & profanity)[Source:MAL] Trailer *MyAnimeList | *Anilist | *Fandom Synopsis Night Raid is the covert assassination branch of the Revolutionary Army, an uprising assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, whose avarice and greed for power has led him to take advantage of the child emperor’s inexperience.

item.title: K-On
item.description: Overview Type:TVEpisodes:13+26Status: Finished AiringAired:Season 1 :-Apr 3, 2009 to Jun 26, 2009 Season 2:- Apr 7, 2010 to Sep 29, 2010Premiered: Spring 2009Broadcast:Fridays at 01:59 (JST)Producers:Pony Canyon, TBS, Movic, Rakuonsha, Animation DoLicensors: Bandai Entertainment, Sentai FilmworksStudios:Kyoto AnimationSource:4-koma mangaGenres:Music, Slice of Life, Comedy, SchoolDuration:24 min. per ep.Rating:PG-13 - Teens 13 or older[Source:MAL] Trailer *MyAnimeList | *Anilist | *Fandom Synopsis A fresh high school year always means much to come, and one of those things is joining a club.

item.title: Summer Pockets
item.description: Overview From the creators of Angel Beats! and CLANNAD, Key, comes their latest emotional, award-winning journey. Follow protagonist Takahara Hairi as he travels to the secluded island Torishirojima, where he rediscovers what it means to enjoy summer vacation. [Source: Steam] Description Summer Pockets is set on an isolated, rural and peaceful island on the Seto Inland Sea called Torishirojima, which has a population of about 2,000 people. The protagonist is Hairi Takahara, a young man not native to the island.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: What Is Anime? Anime is hand-drawn and computer animation originating from Japan. In Japan and in Japanese, anime describes all animated works, regardless of style or origin. However, outside of Japan and in English, anime is colloquial for Japanese animation and refers specifically to animation produced in Japan.What Is Manga? Manga are comics or graphic novels originating from Japan. Most manga conform to a style developed in Japan in the late 19th century, and the form has a long prehistory in earlier Japanese art.
